# PixelLab.ai Prompts â€” Pixel Art Assets for Penalty Shootout Game

Use these prompts directly in PixelLab.ai. Prefer specifying size (e.g., 16x16, 32x32, 64x64), "pixel art", "8-bit", and "transparent background".

---

## Character Assets

1) Soccer Player (Kicker) - Idle Pose
```
A pixel art soccer player character in idle standing pose, wearing blue jersey and white shorts, front view, 64x64 pixels, 8-bit style, clean pixel lines, simple design, transparent background, retro game aesthetic
```

2) Soccer Player - Kicking Left
```
A pixel art soccer player kicking a ball to the left, dynamic kick pose, wearing blue jersey, 64x64 pixels, 8-bit retro game style, side view, leg extended left, clean pixels, transparent background
```

3) Soccer Player - Kicking Center
```
A pixel art soccer player kicking a ball straight forward, powerful kick pose, wearing blue jersey, 64x64 pixels, front view, 8-bit style, clean pixel art, transparent background
```

4) Soccer Player - Kicking Right
```
A pixel art soccer player kicking a ball to the right, dynamic kick pose, wearing blue jersey, 64x64 pixels, 8-bit retro style, side view, leg extended right, clean pixels, transparent background
```

5) Goalkeeper - Idle Pose
```
A pixel art soccer goalkeeper in ready stance, wearing green jersey with gloves, crouched position, 64x64 pixels, 8-bit style, front view, clean pixel lines, transparent background, retro game aesthetic
```

6) Goalkeeper - Diving Left
```
A pixel art goalkeeper diving to the left, dynamic save motion, wearing green jersey, 64x64 pixels, 8-bit retro style, horizontal diving pose, arms extended, transparent background
```

7) Goalkeeper - Diving Center
```
A pixel art goalkeeper jumping upward in center, arms raised, wearing green jersey, 64x64 pixels, 8-bit style, vertical leap pose, transparent background
```

8) Goalkeeper - Diving Right
```
A pixel art goalkeeper diving to the right, dynamic save motion, wearing green jersey, 64x64 pixels, 8-bit retro style, horizontal diving pose, transparent background
```

## Effect Assets

26) Goal Explosion Effect
```
A pixel art explosion effect for goal celebration, burst of yellow and orange particles radiating outward, 128x128 pixels, 8-bit style, transparent background
```

27) Save Effect
```
A pixel art save effect, blue shield or barrier impact visual, 128x128 pixels, 8-bit style, transparent background
```

28) Spark Particles
```
Pixel art spark particles, small twinkling star shapes, white/yellow, 16x16 pixels each, 8-bit style, transparent background
```

29) Smoke/Dust Cloud
```
A pixel art dust cloud effect, small puffy cloud shape, gray/white, 32x32 pixels, 8-bit style, transparent background
```

30) Ball Trail Effect
```
A pixel art ball motion trail, streaky line segments, white fade gradient, 8x8 pixels per segment, 8-bit style, transparent background
```


37) Goalkeeper Celebration Pose
```
A pixel art goalkeeper celebrating save, fist pump, 64x64 pixels, 8-bit style, transparent background
```

---

## Prompt Hints & Settings
- Always include: `pixel art`, `8-bit`, `transparent background`, and desired `size`.
- Use short descriptors: `clean pixels`, `minimal details`, `retro game aesthetic`, `front view` or `side view`.
- Formula: `[Object] + pixel art + [pose/action] + [size] + 8-bit style + clean pixels + transparent background`

---

## Quick Copy (English-ready one-liners)
Use these single-line prompts for fast copy/paste:
- "pixel art soccer player idle, blue jersey, 64x64, 8-bit, transparent background"
- "pixel art goalkeeper diving left, green jersey, 64x64, 8-bit, transparent background"
- "pixel art soccer ball, black white pentagon, 16x16, 8-bit, transparent background"
- "pixel art goal post with net, front view, 256x256, 8-bit, transparent background"
- "pixel art goal explosion, burst of yellow orange particles, 128x128, 8-bit, transparent background"
